de.affect.gui

Interface EmotionMaintainerNotifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AffectMonitorFrame, AffectMonitorInternalFrame

    public interface EmotionMaintainerNotifier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEmotionMaintenanceListener(EmotionMaintenanceListener li)
      Adds the specified listener to the list of emotion change listeners.
      void notifyEmotionMaintenanceListener(java.lang.String character, EmotionType emotionType, double emotionIntensity)
      Notifies all registered listeners that the specified emotion has changed.
      void removeEmotionMaintenanceListener(EmotionMaintenanceListener li)
      Removes the specified listener from the list of emotion change listeners.

    • Method Detail

      • addEmotionMaintenanceListener

        void addEmotionMaintenanceListener(EmotionMaintenanceListener li)
        Adds the specified listener to the list of emotion change listeners.
        Parameters:
        li - the listener that should be added

      • removeEmotionMaintenanceListener

        void removeEmotionMaintenanceListener(EmotionMaintenanceListener li)
        Removes the specified listener from the list of emotion change listeners.
        Parameters:
        li - the listener that should be removed

      • notifyEmotionMaintenanceListener

        void notifyEmotionMaintenanceListener(java.lang.String character,
                                    EmotionType emotionType,
                                    double emotionIntensity)
        Notifies all registered listeners that the specified emotion has changed.
        Parameters:
        character - name of the character emotionType the type of the changed emotion emotionIntensity the intensity of the changed emotion
